info.title: Swagger-API Documentation for SELL MOBILES
info.description: A sample API that displays the details of sell mobiles website apis using the features in the swagger-3.0.0 specification

servers.description: API base url path for all the existing routes

get.description: Get Mobiles Data exisisting in Database

PostMobileData.description: This `mobile` data is obtained by posting data in `Post Mobiles` form

links.description: Some bad request has been made. Please check with the equest url or request body

PostMobileData.description: No data found at the requested url. Please check with the url or enter some data using `Post Mobiles` form

post.description: Fetch Mobiles Data exisisting in Database with the brand name

requestBody.description: Enter the brand name of the mobile along with the location name (If not location specific make its value as 'India')

get.description: Get Mobiles basing on the filter query applied as the search criteria

parameters.name: filterquery
parameters.description: Enter the filterquery for getting required mobile details. Enter the required filter fields and remove the remaining if not required. If multiple filters are to e applied seperate the string using comma (,) (Enter the default location value as India)
